physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 5 x 7 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''Mideast Information Committee (ADL), Front L. - Mr. Yakov (Jacob) Barmore, R. - Mr. John Kamlet. 1971 Allied Council Pres., Back L. - Mr. Morton Margolin - ME Committee Chairman, C. - Mr. Ian Gardenswartz - American student for Israel D.U., R. - Mrs. Harry (Lil) Hoffman - Co - Chairman Com of Concern for Soviet Jewry; ADL; 1/21/72.''

mods.abstract: Back row left to right Mr. Morton Margolin, ME Committee Chairman; Mr. Ian Gardenswartz, American student for Israel D.U.; and Mrs. Harry (Lil) Hoffman and front row left to right Mr. Yakov (Jacob) Barmore and Mr. John Kamlet, 1971 Allied Council President pose together at the Anti-Defamation League Mideast Information Committee.

name.namePart: B'nai B'rith.--Anti-defamation League.--Mountain States Regional Office
